title: Yankee Candle Sparkling Cinnamon Fragrance Spheres, Festive Scent
features: Top Note: Cinnamon Stick. Top is the initial impression of the fragrance.
Mid Note: Clove, Cardamom . Middle is the main body of the scent.

description: Holiday glow...the spicy warmth of real imported stick cinnamon with a hint of cloves.Fragrance Notes:Top: Cinnamon StickMid: Clove, Cardamom Base: Bay Leaf, CedarwoodTop note is the initial impression of the fragrance, middle note is the main body of the scent and base is its final impression. About Fragrance Spheres: NEW and improved! Now with 20% more fragrance and new honeycomb lid design. The little beads in our Fragrance Spheres are actually a big deal--they neutralize odors and refresh small spaces for 30 days with your favorite fragrance. Just think--that's a full month of fragrance-fresh lockers, closets, bathrooms and all those other places with stagnant air. They're so easy to use. . . just pull off the protective cover and replace the decorative lid. Honeycomb cutouts in the lid allow the fragrance to diffuse into the air. You'll know it's time to replace the jar once all the beads shrink. Ingenious!.
